name: expre-parser
author: Codenautas <codenautas@googlegroups.com>
contributors: Raquel N Salva <raquelzssalva@gmail.com>, Eugenio Arosteguy <eugenio.arosteguy@gmail.com>, Emilio Platzer <emilioplatzer@gmail.com>

scripts.clink: npm prune && npm i && npm run build && npm link varcal && npm run build
scripts.git-commit: git add package.json && (git commit -m "upgrading stack dependencies" || true)
scripts.push-publish: npm version patch && ncu -u && npm run git-commit && npm publish && git push
scripts.x-test: tsc || echo "continue with errors" && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks lib\test\*.js
scripts.test: (tsc || echo "continue with errors") && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks lib/test/*.js
